This is a android application project, the goal of this application are:
 * Records your daily money spend.
 * Shows monthly/year report
 * Exports csv or excel

[ConceptOfDailyMoney Concept of daily-money]


=Download=
You can download apk file here : http://code.google.com/p/daily-money/downloads/list <br/>
